medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient presented for evaluation of upper airway obstruction.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had an artificial upper trachea due to multiple trauma sustained 10 years ago, including a severe tracheal injury. The stent was replaced approximately every year. Symptoms of airway obstruction have persisted over the years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic pain and long-term opioid therapy due to management of his traumatic injuries and complications from the airway obstruction. Previous anesthetics complicated by difficulties with airway management.
